event.title: Iron Maiden
event.description:
http://whiplash.net/materias/news_879/082861-ironmaiden.html

O que era especulação alguns meses atrás acaba de se tornar realidade. Os fãs mineiros do Iron Maiden tem agora mais um motivo para comemorar, pois a banda fará um show em Belo Horizonte no Mineirinho, no dia 18 de março.

Com isto, as apresentações no Brasil agora já somam seis datas, a saber:

12 de março - Manaus
14 de março - Rio de Janeiro
15 de março - São Paulo
18 de março - Belo Horizonte
20 de março - Brasilia
31 de março - Recife

A nova data ainda não está no site da banda, mas já é confirmada pela produtora que está trazendo o grupo. Vale observar também que a data de Recife foi adiada, ficando agora para o dia 31.

event.title: Iron Maiden
event.description:
Show do Iron Maiden, turnê “Somewhere Back in Time”
Data: 18 de março, quarta-feira, às 21h
Local: Mineirinho - Avenida Abraão Caram, 1000, Pampulha
Censura: 16 anos
Valor dos ingressos: Arquibancada: R$ 200,00 (inteira) / R$ 100,00 (meia-entrada conforme a lei)
Pista: R$ 300,00 (inteira) / R$ 150,00 (meia-entrada conforme a lei)
Pista Premium: R$ 500,00 (inteira) / R$ 250,00 (meia-entrada conforme a lei)

Informações:
Venda dos ingressos:
Bilheteria do Mineirinho (Avenida Antônio Abrahão Caram nº1000 – Pampulha)
Segunda à sexta, das 13h às 19h e sábado, de 9h às 13h.
Site: http://www.livepass.com.br
Blog: www.ironmaidenbh2009.blogspot.com/

event.title: IRON MAIDEN EM BRASILIA - 20/03/2009
event.description:
Dates for Brazil are now announced as part of Iron Maiden's extensive journey around Latin America on the final leg of their Somewhere Back in Time World Tour. These are:

Thursday March 12 - MANAUS, Sambrodromo
Saturday March 14 - RIO DE JANEIRO, Apoteose
Sunday March 15 - SAO PAULO, Autdromo de Interlagos
Wed March 18 RECIFE, Estdio Municipal
Fri March 20 BRASILIA, Estádio Mané Garrincha

For more information go to: http://www.mondoentretenimento.com.br

This will be the first time that the band have ever played in the beautiful coastal city of Recife, the capital city Brasilia, and Manaus, situated on the Amazon in the very heart of the rainforest. It will also be their first visit to Rio for 6 years.

Following massive demand for tickets and the rapid sell out of the 40,000 capacity Palmeiras Stadium in Sao Paolo earlier this year the band will also return there again, but this time in a much bigger venue, the famous Formula One Grand Prix circuit Interlagos, where Lewis Hamilton sealed the Formula One World Championship last month. Other than Formula One Racing, the only other events ever to be arranged there are a concert by Kiss in 1999, Brazil's Skol Beat electronic dance festival and an appearance by His Holiness the Pope, for whom hundreds of thousands turned out. It promises to be a very special event

See local media for more details.

More Latin America concerts will be announced soon.

http://www.ironmaiden.com/index.php?categoryid=8&p2_articleid=1025Iron Maiden

event.title: Iron Maiden
event.description:
Confirmada la fecha en la pagina oficial!!
March 22 - Club Hipico, SANTIAGO, Chile - cap 50,000 - www.ticketmaster.cl

Se cumple la promesa de Bruce Dickinson, Iron Maiden regresa sólo un año después de su último show, el 9 de marzo pasado en la Pista Atlética, y la ambición es juntar a 50 mil personas en el mayor concierto que hayan dado en escenarios locales. Se trata del cierre del tour de grandes éxitos "Somewhere back in time", que tiene sus últimas fechas en India, Nueva Zelandia y Latinoamérica.

Las entradas para este show de la doncella estarán a la venta a fines de noviembre. Ahora sin embargo, Steve Harris comentó que para esta visita, el grupo desplegará una mayor cantidad de canciones de los cuatro primeros álbumes, como lo hizo en el tour del DVD "The History Of Iron Maiden: The Early Days", el 2005.

Fuente: Rockaxis, El Mercurio

event.title: Iron Maiden - Somewhere Back In Time World Tour 2009
Quilmes Rock '09 - Iron Maiden
event.description: La legendaria y aclamada banda de heavy metal presentará un show increíble con todos los efectos explosivos y una diferente selección de canciones en el marco de su gira “Somewhere Back in Time” que ya ha sido visto en Europa y Norteamérica. En esta noche también se presentarán: Sepultura, Lauren Harris , Horcas y O'Connor.

event.title: Iron Maiden em Recife (Somewhere Back in Time World Tour)
event.description:
Dates for Brazil are now announced as part of Iron Maiden's extensive journey around Latin America on the final leg of their Somewhere Back in Time World Tour. These are:

Thursday March 12 - MANAUS, Sambódromo
Saturday March 14 - RIO DE JANEIRO, Apoteose
Sunday March 15 - SAO PAULO, Autódromo de Interlagos
Fri March 20 BRASILIA, Brasilia Camping
Tue March 31 RECIFE, Jockey Club

For more information go to: http://www.mondoentretenimento.com.br

This will be the first time that the band have ever played in the beautiful coastal city of Recife, the capital city Brasilia, and Manaus, situated on the Amazon in the very heart of the rainforest. It will also be their first visit to Rio for 6 years.

Following massive demand for tickets and the rapid sell out of the 40,000 capacity Palmeiras Stadium in Sao Paolo earlier this year the band will also return there again, but this time in a much bigger venue, the famous Formula One Grand Prix circuit Interlagos, where Lewis Hamilton sealed the Formula One World Championship last month. Other than Formula One Racing, the only other events ever to be arranged there are a concert by Kiss in 1999, Brazil's Skol Beat electronic dance festival and an appearance by His Holiness the Pope, for whom hundreds of thousands turned out. It promises to be a very special event.

fonte: site oficial

event.title: Somewhere Back In Time Tour 2009
event.description:
The last show of the Somewhere Back In Time Tour!

Says band founder Steve Harris "We will be loading onto the plane as much equipment as we can ram in, along with plenty of pyro!! The set list will be a bit different to the shows we have done so far on this tour as we will include a few more songs from the first four albums. This show is likely to be the last time we play many of these songs live so we really will be giving it everything we have got!"

event.title: Iron Maident Comes to San Antonio

artists.artist: some other bands you never here of

event.description: Awesome! Iron Maiden has finally decided to come to San Antonio for the first time in 20 something years. I checked out the playlist and they are going to have the best songs Iron Maiden ever wrote.
